CustomField.description: This field controls whether the License should be deleted from Cornerstone. A SysPartyLicense key must exist on this record and the SoftDelete picklist should be set to Yes before saving.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field controls whether the License should be deleted from Cornerstone. A SysPartyLicense key must exist on this record and the SoftDelete picklist should be set to Yes before saving.
CustomField.label: SoftDelete
